attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let's have a new party for the ENGLISH one that does not have a Scottish person in control,brown has run this party down to such a position that they have no chance of getting in at next election. Scotland and wales get free prescriptions while the English have to pay.Also how can you trust a prime minister who lies to the whole nation on a referendum a leopard never changes its spots. At last an MP who is willing to speak out against Gordon Brown. Charles Clarke is spot on brown must be forced to step down.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
